comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: On May 11, 1914, President Wilson attended a service in New York City in honor of men who had died in Vera Cruz. See NYT of May 12, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9803E7D8173DE633A...

comment.author: 52749764@N06
comment._content: This is a great picture - you can see he had a lot on his mind.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Another shot of President Wilson in the Presidential carriage, at the National Memorial Service for the 17 U. S. Sailors killed at Vera Cruz in April: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5516953149/] Story of plans for the memorial service, in the New York Times, 5/11/14: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=940CE3DB173AE6...
